meanings.sent1: At the party, they passed around bottles of firewaters for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a variety of firewaters to the customers at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The pirates celebrated their victory with a toast of the fiery firewaters.
meanings.sent4: The firewaters flowed freely at the festival, warming up the chilly evening.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the potent firewaters filled the room, enticing all to take a sip.

meanings.definition: The liquid that comes from a fire.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters used hoses to extinguish the flames and control the firewaters.
meanings.sent2: After the fire was put out, the charred remains were soaked in firewaters.
meanings.sent3: The campers collected rainwater to prevent their campfire from turning into firewaters.
meanings.sent4: The chef accidentally spilled the pot, causing the firewaters to spread across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent5: The firewaters bubbled and hissed as they met the scorching flames, creating a mesmerizing dance.
